phrase.item: That was a village road.
Relative Clause
On that road was a ruined hall.
Relative Clause Compound word
Opposite to the ruined hall was a babul tree.
Verb conjunct
In the favour of that tree, some wild creeper has spread on it.
Since the wild creeper had ripen stem and the head became old, ripe leaf alone was there without falling on the ground.
Near the root of the stem, on the neem tree there is a hole.
At the entrance of the hole, right under the old leaf there is a small sand ball
One black ant in a majestic physique, rubbing the mustache gently came out.
Murmuring, 'It's a long time since (I) have seen the world', the ant who was like the lion that roams free in the lonely forest, having turned its head from one end to the other, looked at the world.
A small ant came in front of it in a hurry.
The big ant asked about the well being of the small ant saying in a roaring voice, "what boy are you well?"
The small ant without being able to answer the question that was asked, shivering, ran back the way (it) came
Having murmured saying, "Do (you) have fear, (you) will live", the ant which was rubbing the mustache, when (it) stood up (and) raised its head to see...
"What is this in between?" "something hides(the view)"
Oh! is it this mountain?
(It) took a few steps ahead, kept its hand on the sand ball, lifted the head and looked at those who return from the market.
Who knows whether it knows about Bimasenan who is fixing his club on the earth and standing?
Its manner was like that only.
Who is it? Human beings aren't they? (They are very much sluggards)
Suddenly it got a doubt:
Who is more in the world? Is it human beings or our ant gang?
It kept thinking about it.
It was not able to calculate properly
What if (I) call one of them and ask?
That too is correct
Having stood behind the sand ball, stretching the head, lifting both the hands, opening the mouth that was like a split mustard and said roaring , "hey human beings, one of you come here"
That is all! All the human beings that were going on the road scattered and ran: ran and hid in the old mansion.
They ran and hid themselves in the ruined hall.
The ant was clapping , and making noise saying "Oh! Oh! "Are you that much scared looking at me! Look you, coward boys!" and went round and round the sand ball.
"What is this? In this summer season it is raining? Summer rains are like that only"
The ant heard the words of those men who were talking in the old mansion
The ant was surprised saying " What? Rain!"

What is this? It is absolutely crazy! Rain? Who cares? Even I am standing outside. It is true that the sky is dark! The ant was making fun, laughing and jumping saying, "Are (they) afraid for that this much? Absolutely coward boys; Rain? Who cares?"
When (it) was surprised thinking about human beings that , "these human beings are like this only. They make a big fuss for nothing", the sky suddenly became clear and shining spreading light.
The mocking laughter of the ant did not fall on their ears.
In a few moments, steam evaporated and heat came out from the drops of water that were on the earth.
Another crowd was walking on the road.
One person was fanning saying, "how sultry it is?"
The water that was on the old leaf that crept on the babul tree, having rolled one by one, gathered in the center stem and became a big ball; the ball that was gathered slowly rolled down
The pearl that was assembled, slowly rolled
Following the water ball that fell on the head of the ant that was mounting on the sand ball, the old leaf also dropped off and fell on the sand ball.
Shouting saying, "Alas flood, alas flood, the sky is broken and fallen", the ant that came out removing the old leaf, shrieked looking at the sand ball that dissolved
The ant with out knowing what to do, ran in a hurry shrieking saying, "Look human beings, escape, run quickly, flood has come, run, run!"
Having fanned with the towel, one person took shelter under the tree saying, " What a heat it is!"
Look crazy human beings, (you) are running for nothing as if the world is rolling away, now when a great danger has happened, (you) behave foolishly don't you?
No! no! I am ashamed of you.
Now, how will I look after myself?
The ant run helter skelter, went and entered its hole saying, " How will I save myself? It looks as if the flood will come?"
